title: FS: 1927 Exhibits Ty Cobb SGC Vg-Ex 4
author: Casey2296

posts.post_title: FS: 1927 Exhibits Ty Cobb SGC Vg-Ex 4
posts.post_content:
Very nice example.  No creases, dents, or scratches, some minor rubbing on the corners, clean back.  $Sold pp/ff includes shipping.  
This is the super rare larger back than front version (damn scanner).
"I'll take it" supersedes negotiations, pm with any questions.
Thanks for looking.
-
